title: Groovy Zilean splash on the PBE
body: The replaced splash on the PBE looks disgusting. The current live Zilean splash is SO much better.

replies.body: Mind my comment i swear they changed the splashes due to it not looking like the skin now but they didn't :/ they should though

All of the skin splashes they are changing their ones on live (Before this patch) are way better then what they were before. for example sion's they look nothing alike the old sion they said that before thats why they changed the splashes but now they brought those older splashes back i don't understand riot!
That's the same for a lot of skins. It is not a very good art trade.
